H0.text: What was the profession of Paul Strand (1890 - 1976). Artist

H1.text: What was the profession of Paul Strand (1890 - 1976). Cinematographer

H2.text: What was the profession of Paul Strand (1890 - 1976). Painter

H3.text: What was the profession of Paul Strand (1890 - 1976). Photographr

A4.text: Paul Strand was an American photographer and filmmaker.

A5.text: He helped establish photography as an art form in the 20th century.

A6.text: including traditional media such as painting, sculpture, photography, and printmaking
